Title: RLBCAU Teaching and Non-Teaching Recruitment 2026 Notification
Summary:
- Rani Lakshmi Bai Central Agricultural University (RLBCAU) has announced a major recruitment drive for the year 2026 to fill various statutory, teaching, and  non-teaching  positions
- The university has released a notification for  75 vacancies  for the posts of Registrar, Dean, Associate Professor, Assistant Professor, and Assistant Registrar
- The online application process for RLBCAU Recruitment 2026 begins on 22nd January 2026 and ends on 21st February 2026

Title: NCESS Junior Technician Recruitment 2026 Notification
Summary:
- The National Centre for Earth Science Studies (NCESS) has announced a recruitment drive for 2026 for regular Group ‘C’ positions
- The autonomous research centre under the Ministry of Earth Sciences (MoES), Government of India, has invited online applications for a total of 03 posts of Junior Technician
- The NCESS Junior Technician recruitment includes vacancies for both Unreserved (UR) and Scheduled Caste (SC) categories

Title: NBEMS Fellowship Entrance Test 2026 Notification
Summary:
- The National Board of Examinations in Medical Sciences (NBEMS) has announced the Fellowship Entrance Test (FET) 2025-26 for admission to Fellow of National Board (FNB) courses
- The board has announced admissions across 36 specialties for Indian candidates
- The online application for this entrance examination begins on 14th January 2026 and ends on 3rd February 2026

Title: CSIR-NML MTS Recruitment 2026 Notification
Summary:
- CSIR-NML MTS Recruitment 2026 has been announced for the recruitment of Group C, Non-Gazetted Multi Tasking Staff (MTS) positions
- The CSIR-National Metallurgical Laboratory, Jamshedpur, has announced a total of 22 vacancies across various trade-specific and general MTS posts
- The online application process began on 5th January 2026 and the last date to apply is 6th February 2026

Title: AAI Junior Executive Result
Summary:
- The Airports Authority of India (AAI) has officially released the provisionally shortlisted candidates list for the posts of Junior Executive (Engineering Civil) and Junior Executive (Engineering Electrical)
- The result has been published on the official website aai
- aero on 20th January 2026

Title: Supreme Court Law Clerk Recruitment 2026 Notification
Summary:
- The Supreme Court of India has announced the recruitment of Law Clerk-cum-Research Associates on a prestigious short-term contractual assignment for the 2026-2027 term
- This highly sought-after opportunity is aimed at preparing a panel of approximately 90 candidates
- The online application process begins on 20th January 2026 and the last date to apply is 7th February 2026

Title: IIIT Bhopal Recruitment 2026 Notification
Summary:
- IIIT Bhopal Recruitment 2026 has been announced for the recruitment of Group C Non-Faculty positions in a prestigious Institute of National Importance
- The institute has announced 2 vacancies for the post of Junior Technician on a direct recruitment basis
- The online application for this recruitment begins on 21st January 2026 and ends on 9th February 2026

Title: IIM Udaipur Admissions Intern Notification
Summary:
- IIM Udaipur Admissions Intern Application Window Open: The Indian Institute of Management (IIM) Udaipur has released an official notification inviting applications for the position of Admissions Intern
- Applications are invited for an on-site internship to support the ongoing admissions cycle at the premier B-School
- The application window is now open, and the last date for submission is January 29, 2026

Title: RBI Grade B Phase II Result
Summary:
- The Reserve Bank of India Services Board (RBISB) has released the list of shortlisted candidates for the Grade B Officer Phase-II examination held on December 6, 2025
- The result is now available on the official portal  opportunities

Title: RSSB Platoon Commander Result
Summary:
- The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB/RSMSSB) has officially released the RSSB Platoon Commander Result 2025 on January 17, 2026
- The written examination for the Platoon Commander Competitive Exam 2025 was conducted on 22 November 2025 across Rajasthan
- This recruitment drive aims to fill 84 Platoon Commander posts under the Home Guard Department, Government of Rajasthan

Title: Assam Police Jail Warder Vacancy Notification
Summary:
- Assam Police Jail Warder Recruitment 2026: The State Level Police Recruitment Board, Assam (SLPRB) has released the official advertisement for the recruitment of Jail Warder in the Prison Department
- Online applications are invited for 138 vacancies
- The application link will be active on the SLPRB website from January 22, 2026

Title: XAT 2026 Result
Summary:

- Candidates who appeared for the Xavier Aptitude Test (XAT) 2026 can now check and download their scorecards from the official website,  xatonline

- The Union Public Service Commission is going to conduct Combined Defence Services Exam on 14th September, 2025
- The main purpose of the exam is to recruit the most suitable candidates in the various defence sectors like Indian Military Academy, Officers Training Academy, Indian Air Force Academy and the Indian Naval Academy
- The Union Public Service Commission conducts the CDS Exam twice a Year

Summary:

- Eligible and interested candidates may apply online only through the official website of the New India Assurance Company Limited (NIACL)
- If you are interested in applying for the NIACL Apprentice Posts, make sure you meet the requirements

Title: RRB ALP CEN 01/2025 Notification
Summary:
- RRB ALP CEN 01/2025 Notification: The Railway Recruitment Boards (RRBs), under the Ministry of Railways, Government of India, have announced the Centralized Employment Notice (CEN) No
- 01/2025 for the recruitment of Assistant Loco Pilots (ALP)
- The RRB ALP Recruitment 2025 Notification was released on March 29, 2025, with online applications opening from April 12, 2025, to May 19, 2025

- WB Polytechnic Admission 2025 : The West Bengal State Council of Technical and Vocational Education and Skill Development (WBSCTVESD) has released the notification for WB Polytechnic Admission 2025
- Aspiring candidates can apply for 3-year diploma courses in Engineering & Technology for first-year entry, and 2-year diploma courses for lateral (second-year) entry across various disciplines
- This admission process covers government, government-sponsored, and self-financed polytechnic institutions across West Bengal

- The Indian National Biology Olympiad (INBO) is a big national-level exam for school students who love biology
- It helps students show their knowledge and gives them a chance to represent India in the International Biology Olympiad (IBO) – a very prestigious global competition
- If you’re thinking about taking part in INBO 2024-25, it’s important to understand the rules, syllabus, and exam format

- JIPMAT Answer Key 2025 : The National Testing Agency (NTA) has officially released the JIPMAT 2025 Provisional Answer Key for the Joint Integrated Programme in Management Admission Test (JIPMAT) held on April 26, 2025
- Candidates who appeared for this national-level management entrance exam can now check the provisional answer keys, their recorded responses, and the official question paper on the NTA’s JIPMAT website –  exams
- nta

- SJVN Executive Trainee Recruitment 2025 : Satluj Jal Vidyut Nigam (SJVN) has announced 114 Executive Trainee job openings
- Candidates who are interested and meet the eligibility criteria can apply online on the official SJVN website
- The last date to submit the application form is 18th May 2025

- If you are waiting for the JKSET Cut Off Marks 2025, then your wait is almost over
- The University of Jammu will soon release it online
- So, candidates should keep checking the official JKSET website regularly

- The Gujarat Public Service Commission (GPSC) has officially released the  GPSC Answer Key 2025  for the Class 1 and 2 Preliminary Examination
- Candidates who appeared for the exam held on 20 April 2025 can now download the provisional answer key from the official website — gpsc
- gujarat

- RITES Ltd Recruitment 2025 : RITES Ltd, a Government of India enterprise under the Ministry of Railways, has released a new notification for hiring experienced professionals
- The  RITES Ltd Senior Resident Engineer/ S&T, Design Engineer/Civil, and Other Recruitment 2025  is now open for multiple posts across engineering disciplines
- This recruitment will be done through walk-in interviews for various project sites in Delhi NCR and Gurgaon

Title: IAF Air Force Agniveer 01/2026 Result
Summary:
- Air Force Agniveer Notification: The Indian Air Force (IAF) invites online applications from unmarried Indian male and female candidates for the Agniveer Vayu Intake 01/2026 under the Agnipath Scheme
- Eligible and interested candidates can apply online through the official website from 07 January 2024 to 27 January 2024
- If you are interested in applying for the Indian Air Force Agniveer Vayu Posts, make sure you fulfill the requirements
